description: This Java class configures web-related settings for the notes backend project, including CORS policy and OpenAPI metadata for API documentation.

classes.name: WebConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for web settings, including CORS policy and OpenAPI info.

methods.name: corsConfigurer
methods.description: Defines a permissive CORS policy for local development, allowing all origins, methods, and headers.

methods.name: customOpenAPI
methods.description: Creates and returns an OpenAPI instance with API metadata such as title, version, and description.
